import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Upload } from 'lucide-react'; const CustomerEntry = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ customerId: 'RMT-CUS-005088', customerType: 'New', customerName: '', fatherName: '', motherName: '', dob: '05-10-2007', present: { address1: '', address2: '', state: 'Select', city: '', pin: '' }, permanent: { address1: '', address2: '', state: 'Select', city: '', pin: '' }, office: { address1: '', address2: '', state: 'Select', city: '', pin: '' }, ref1Name: '', ref1PhNo: '', ref2Name: '', ref2PhNo: '', customerMobile1: '', customerMobile2: '', customerEmail: '', areaCollectionArea: 'Select' }); const [selectedImage, setSelectedImage] = useState(null); const handleImageChange = (e) => { const file = e.target.files[0]; if (file) { const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = (e) => setSelectedImage(e.target.result); reader.readAsDataURL(file); } }; return (
